titleStmt.title: Adrian Van Sinderen to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7996

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
ADRIAN VAN SINDEREN,
Attorney and Counsellor,
69 Wall Street.
New York, 28th May 1863.
Sir --

I was appointed a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky June 26. 1857, and my commission therefore expired in 1861. I have hitherto neglected to apply for a renewal; but I desire now to say that I should consider a re-appointment as a great favor; and I hope, that, if there is no obstacle in the way, the Governor may accede to my wishes in this regard.

To Hon.
D. C. Wickliffe
Secy. of State.
Frankfort
Ky.

New York
Comr of Deeds
A. Van Sinderen
(City)
Appd June 4. 1863
